name: Liga Polska Manager 96
overview: Liga Polska Manager '96 is a sports management game, developed by Group M and published by Marksoft, which was released in Europe in 1995. Liga Polska Manager 96 is an updated and expanded football management game for 1996. The game allows the player to select a team, manage and promote it and gather the players and coaches for success in this competitive league sport. The second game in MarkSoft's Liga Polska Manager series of football management games. You start off managing a team in first or second Polish league. The game covers national backyard and European cups. The game has all the typical options for managers in the mid 90s. The features include the sale and rental of the players, setting the salary, advertising, television rights, type of transportation, accommodation, bonuses, ticket prices, a full set of statistics and graphs, training, tactics, expansion of the stadium and others. All players are described by: technique, speed, passing, shooting. During the match, all the interesting situations are presented in the form of isometric video animation.
